organisation_name: Federation of European Direct and Interactive Marketing (FEDMA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: FIQUET#Mathilde, PAMOUKOGLOU#Ioanna, PROUST#Géraldine Jeanne Anne, TCHOMPALOVA#Joana
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder consultation group for the Fitness Check of EU consumer and marketing law #E03423#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3423#Member#C#Multistakeholder expert group to support the application of Regulation (EU) 2016/679#E03537#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3537#Member#C
membership: FEDMA is an industry member of the European Advertising Standards Alliance (EASA)
goals__remit: The principal aim of FEDMA is to promote and protect the European data driven marketing industry by creating greater acceptance and usage of, and confidence in direct and interactive marketing by European consumers and business communities.Moreover, FEDMA fights for the freedom of communication by encouraging European institutions to ensure a healthy commercial and legislative environment within which the industry may profitably operate and develop.
